summary.para: Retrieves the preferred view size of the application being launched.

param.name: targetSizeOnLaunch
param.para: Contains the address of a pointer to an for the target application.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides a method for retrieving the preferred view size for a new application window.
